suggest.meta_keywords: CORS policy, Azion platform, HTTP headers, domain configuration, Azion Console, Azion Real-Time Manager, CORS error solution, XMLHTTPRequest, Add Response Header, Cross-Origin Resource Sharing
suggest.meta_description: Learn how to configure CORS policies using Azion platforms to fix errors. Find detailed steps for domain setups on both Console and Real-Time Manager.

current.meta_description: A Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) policy can block a request from a resource located in another domain different than the domain in use. Find out how to configure your application to fix this error.
